Kurze Audio-/Video-Sequenzen zu vertraut: Understand short audio/video sequences on familiar topics (e.g. family, school, leisure).
Einfache Gespräche zwischen Muttersprach: Roughly understand simple conversations between native speakers on known topics.
Sich vorstellen, einfache Fragen stellen: Introduce oneself, ask and answer simple questions (name, origin, preferences).
Kurze Dialoge führen, um Informationen a: Conduct short dialogues to exchange information or ask for something.
Einfach zusammenhängend über Alltag, Erf: Report simply and coherently on everyday life, experiences, or plans.
Kurze, einfache Texte (z.B. Anzeigen, E-: Understand short, simple texts (e.g. advertisements, emails) globally.
Konkrete Informationen in bekannten Text: Extract concrete information in known text types (timetable, website, worksheet).
Etwas längere Texte zu vertrauten Themen: Understand slightly longer texts on familiar topics globally and with simple details.
Kurze Mitteilungen, Grüße oder Notizen s: Write short messages, greetings, or notes (e.g. postcard, chat).
Kurze Texte zu Alltagsthemen planen und: Plan and compose short texts on everyday topics (e.g. description, invitation).
Auf Rückfragen reagieren und einfache Rü: React to queries and give simple written feedback.
Einzelne Informationen mündlich oder sch: Pass on individual information orally or in writing in the correct sense.
Kurze Notizen/Botschaften aus dem Deutsc: Transfer short notes/messages from German into French (and vice versa).
In einfachen Situationen zwischen zwei P: Mediate between two people in simple situations (e.g. appointments, directions).
Alltagskultur Frankreichs mit eigener Le: Compare everyday culture of France with one's own living environment (school, food, leisure).
Einfache Lern- und Kommunikationsstrateg: Use simple learning and communication strategies specifically (portfolio, dictionary, media).
Projekte oder Austauschaktivitäten vorbe: Prepare and reflect on projects or exchange activities.
Einfache Alltagsäußerungen, Begrüßungen: Understand simple everyday expressions, greetings, and classroom instructions (e.g. directions, time, person).
